name: Where Thoughts Go: Resolutions
description:
What are your new year's resolutions?

Revisit the award-winning world of Where Thoughts Go in an entirely new, free VR experience. Explore the audio New Years Resolutions of countless others who were here before you - and leave yours behind for others to find.

There's a twist, however: the resolutions you record will be sent back to you a year from when you play the experience. What will find, what will you say... and what will your future self think?

If you enjoy the experience, try out the award-winning "Where Thoughts Go: Prologue" on Oculus or Steam!
